message: I'm excited to offer you this valuable product. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something that will bring you significant value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on this product, my budget is capped at $8000. I'm willing to offer you $8500 for it. Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, $8500 is still below my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my desired price. I'm counteroffering at $11000.

Alice, I understand your need to get closer to your desired price, but $11000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9500. This is my final offer, as I can purchase the product from John for $8000 if this doesn't work out.
